Name: Tokyo 42
About the game: Tokyo 42 is a hyper-stylish isometric open-world shooter. Framed for a murder you didn't commit, you'll delve into a world of assassins, deadly corporate intrigue and...tactical cats. Spin the camera to see every angle of this beautifully hand-crafted micro Tokyo, as you discover a huge range of weapons, secrets and stories. Skilful shooting, bullet physics, sneaky stealth and crowd simulation all play a role in this ultra-colourful kinetic frenzy. A single player open-world story mode and a host of multiplayer modes await in this unique and critically acclaimed action masterpiece. 'Stunning...looks like Monument Valley and plays like Grand Theft Auto set in the world of Blade Runner' (Vice) 'Gorgeous...Tokyo 42 is shaping up to be something pretty special' (Kotaku)
Meta Title: Tokyo 42: May 31, 2017, SMAC Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Tokyo 42? Check out the release date (May 31, 2017), developer insights from SMAC Games, and a complete game summary.
